description: Episode of Series "Mirror of Germany. The German Scene = Deutschland Spiegel". Magazine items: The Bee Gees in Germany; the German Navy's three-masted training vessel "Gorch Fock"; the container service for goods transport in Hamburg; Frankfurt Book Fair; the Golden Lion of the Venice Film Festival awarded for the first time since 1945 to a young German director, Alexander Kluge, for the film "Die Artisten in der Zirkuskuppel; ratios"; the Germany Cancer Research Centre at Heidelberg; indoor cycle racing.
